Description: Limestone stela decorated with a representation of a figure with raised arms within a palm-wreath; cross in a circle below; foliate border; Coptic text.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Monastery of Apa Jeremias (said to be from)
Bibliographic references: Beckwith 1963 / Coptic sculpture (no.127 (p.55, pl.127)) (dated 7th or 8th century)
Tudor 2011 / Christian Funerary Stelae of the Byzantine and Arab Periods from Egypt
